title: "wine_reviews_cleaning_code"
output:
  word_document: default
  html_document: default
---

Load dataset using Import Dataset function

Assign loaded dataset to wine_reviews
{r wine_reviews <- winemag.data.130k.v2}

Separate year from title column
{r wine_reviews <- separate(wine_reviews, title, c("title", "type"), sep = "\\(")}

Remove unnecessary columns 

{r wine_reviews <- subset( wine_reviews, select = -c(description, type, region_2, taster_name, taster_twitter_handle))}

Replace NAs with "NA"

{r wine_reviews[is.na(wine_reviews)] <- "NA"}

Replace blanks with "NA"

{r wine_reviews[wine_reviews == ""] <- "NA"}

Create function for trimming leading and trailing spaces

{r trim <- function (x) gsub("^\\s+|\\s+$", "", x)}

Use trim function

{r trim(wine_reviews)}
